meanings.sent1: In Ukraine, people use hryvnyas to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for hryvnyas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny hryvnyas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a handful of colorful hryvnyas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hryvnyas jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Ukraine.
meanings.sent1: She counted the hryvnyas in her wallet carefully.
meanings.sent2: The price of the toy was ten hryvnyas.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled hryvnyas out of his hat instead of rabbits.
meanings.sent4: His words were worth more than a thousand hryvnyas.
meanings.sent5: The hryvnyas sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
